home.title: I'm Dilam Chuquilin
home.description: Student and programmer with a hunger for knowledge and experience, constantly improving my skills with the goal of becoming a Senior developer.

about.description:
My name is Dilam Anderson, a Systems Engineering student, a Full Stack developer with experience creating websites and desktop applications. I specialize in Java with Spring boot; I also have database experience such as MySQL.
Always in the constant search to polish my skills and continue to grow as a professional to present valuable contributions to the work group of which I am a part.

project.title: Statistical System for a Clothing Company
project.description:
This project was created to statistically help a clothing company, allowing it to better manage its resources; It consists of creating a report in HTML to view the results.
It is recommended that the report be opened natively on the desktop
